alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 1:44AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, southern Tyler and Hardin Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Votaw to near Thicket to near Dayton Lakes. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Kountze, Sour Lake, Saratoga, Fred, Wildwood, Warren, Thicket, Bevil Oaks, China, Caney Head, Votaw, Honey Island, Batson and Village Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
